divs: sighting details i just got done watching an episode where a young man and four other friends saw three orange balls come out of the sky. my 5th grade teacher, mr. *(name deleted--cms\sg), told my class of the same sighting. he said that he was walking on a road and a big orange ball, glowing, was in the distance. he said it just dissapeared. it was very large, orange, and bright. i thought he was crazy. this was told to me and my classmates in 2008. i'm 13 now. i am very sceptical, but i thought that i should bring it to your attention. i hope that your interested. i know that the teacher still lives in colorado. i think he is a couach for a nearby school in another town.i have never forgotten the story. if you are interested, i know you could find him. im curious to find out what your thoughts are. i would appreciate it if someone could contact me about the sighting. thank you for your time. respectfully, me p.s. i do understand that this isn't my sighting and that i cannot help you clarify any big details off of what he told me. i will not take credit for any information found.if found. it's his sighting. i just wanted to put the idea out there. i was curious to see what happens. i also have other classmates that remember the story. sorry for any spelling or grammer errors. bye.
